div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.p: The Music Institute Management System (MIMS) is a comprehensive management solution designed specifically for music schools and institutes. This system works well with Odoo. It offers special tools to help manage students, teachers, classes, and money transactions easily. This system makes a smooth process from class scheduling to fee management, enhancing both administrative efficiency and user experience.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.h2:
Manage your instrument academy with ease!
Get started today with our all-in-one system

a.class: btn rippler rippler-default sh_call_to_action_btn btn-1 mx-4

div.span: Students:
Access to view scheduled classes and lessons relevant to their enrollment. -
Teachers:
Ability to view and manage classes, lessons, and personal work slots. Teachers can also assign classes based on their availability and expertise.
Admins:
Admins can access everything on the platform. They can manage all parts of the institute. This includes user roles, class setups, instrument settings, and financial oversight.
Configuring Classes:
Admins can set up and modify class details such as timings, room and instruments assignments, and associated teachers.
Viewing Schedules:
Students and teachers can see upcoming classes and lesson plans. They customize these for their roles and permissions.
Teacher Assignments:
Admins can assign teachers to classes. Teachers can also choose their preferred time slots based on their availability.
Attendance Tracking:
Teachers can take attendance at the beginning of each class, ensuring accurate record-keeping and student tracking.
Absentee Reports:
Admins can generate reports on attendance, including data on absences and tardiness, to monitor student participation.
Fee Configuration:
Admins can configure fee structures based on class type, duration, and other relevant criteria.
Invoice Generation:
Automated invoice generation for student fees, enhancing the billing process.
Printing and Distribution:
Invoices can be either printed or sent via email to students or their guardians, with the ability to personalize and incorporate branding.
Odoo Compatibility:
Fully integrated with Odoo’s suite of applications, ensuring compatibility with existing accounting, HR, and CRM modules.
Data Synchronisation:
Real-time data updates across the system, ensuring all stakeholders have the latest information.

div.p: The system allows for tracking and management of musical instruments, ensuring that their availability aligns with class requirements. Teachers and admins can assign and reserve instruments for specific classes or lessons.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Streamlines scheduling, attendance, and fee management, reducing administrative burdens.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Role-based dashboards provide users with easy access to relevant information.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Automates routine tasks, freeing up time for teaching and improving student engagement.

div.class: col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 sh_main_box

div.p: Comprehensive reporting features enable informed decision-making and operational improvements.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 mx-auto d-block col-md-12 col-12

div.p: You'll get a confirmation email from us soon, letting you know we've received your request and started working on it.
Our solution advisor will review your needs and get back to you within 2 business days.
If needed, we can sign a mutual NDA within 1 business day to keep everything confidential.
Our business development manager will share an initial project estimate or recommendations within 2-4 days.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.p: The Music Institute Management System enhances the operation of music schools. It uses Odoo’s strong platform. This system offers special features for music institutes. From administrative tasks to classroom management, MIMS ensures that every note is in harmony with your institute's operational goals.
